titles.title: Lord, Make Us One. Lord, Make Us One

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord make us one, Lord make us one.
Lord make us one every way.
Lord make us one, Lord make us one.
Lord make us one every day.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Señor unenos, Señor unenos,
Señor unenos con tu poder.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Señor unenos, Señor unenos,
Señor unenos con tu poder.
